name: Smelly Jellies
description:
ControllerKeyboardActionLeft D-PadLeft Arrow Key
Move LeftRight D-PadRight Arrow KeyMove RightA (B on snes controller)ZJumpX(Y on snes controller)XShoot

(Controller is recomeneded method of playing)

Smelly Jellies are invading Good Wood! Make your way to the Queen jelly and kill the colony. (This colony is invasive, do not kill jellies if they are where they belong.)

Music Creator: https://gamejolt.com/@MNATi
Art Pack Used: https://rockymullet.itch.io/forest-gunner-artpack

Note that sometimes the keyboard controls can be a bit wonky and the sound takes a bit to load for some reason.
